text: Rhodesia was short lived British colony that existed from October 24, 1964 until Rhodesia's UDI on November 11, 1965. After Northern Rhodesia became independent as Zambia on October 24, 1964, Southern Rhodesia became simply known as Rhodesia because Northern Rhodesia no longer exists.
